knimeNode.name: ARFF Writer
knimeNode.shortDescription: Writes data into a file in ARFF format.

fullDescription.intro: This node saves data to a file in ARFF format. In the configuration dialog, specify a valid destination file. When executed, the node writes the data, entering through its input port, into the specified location. At this point in time, it only writes not-sparse ARFF files.

ports.dataIn: The datatable to be written to the file
